directions: Place candies in a container with a lid and add vodka. Seal container and place in a cool, dark place, shaking vigorously 1 to 2 times per hour, until candy has dissolved, 3 to 4 hours.
Stir sugar into vodka mixture until dissolved.
ingredients: 20 pieces fruit-flavored hard candy (such as Jolly Rancher®)
title: Jolly Rancher®-Infused Vodka
